INTRODUCTION
Results-driven Machine Learning Engineer, Data Scientist, and Co-founder specializing in specializing in Agentic systems, LLMs, RecSys, E-commerce and SaaS. Highly
experienced in machine learning engineering, data engineering, microservice development, BI/Analytics, cloud ops and devops.
EXPERIENCE
LUMINA PLATFORMS INC. (KYOSO) | FOUNDING ENGINEER
Sept 2024 – Present | New York, USA
• Created state of art agentic system for ads creation and animation capable of
deep understanding of brand and creativity utilizing multimodal RAG
• Led end-to-end teams for distributed microservice pipelines from BE, ML,
Data and CloudOps, delivered highly scalable microservices
• Finetuned custom LLMs using GRPO for layout and animation generation
tasks, optimized for multi GPU training using Deepspeed
• Created and implemented core technical strategic vision
XGEN AI | LEAD MACHINE LEARNING ENGINEER
Nov 2020 – Sept 2024 | New York, USA
• Pioneered and deployed deep recommendation systems and services,
responsible for winning and retaining over $2 Million USD in ARR
• Led innovation and R&D of advanced ML services utilizing GPT based NLP
and RecSys, Graph Neural Nets, Joint Optimization, Vectorized Search
• Consistently demonstrated excellence in customer care, on-call support and
delivering on new features and cutomer requests
• Developed efficient microservices to serve hundreds of thousands of
real-time requests per day in Tensorflow and Pytorch, leveraging AWS cloud
infrastructure and compute
PROCURIFY | DATA SCIENTIST
Feb 2019 – Nov 2020 | New York, USA
• Developed and deployed efficient account code recommender system
microservice for all customers, 90% weighted live accuracy
• Developed robust boosted tree models and SHAP inference for Marketing,
Sales and Churn analysis, 95% test accuracy
• Piloted in depth customer churn analysis of over 400 customers with
estimated churn reduction of 7% quarter over quarter
• Delivered reliable and consistent BI analytics for customer audits
INTEL CANADA LTD. | SILICON VALIDATION ENGINEER
Jan 2018 – Feb 2019 | New York, USA
• Developed advanced hardware features including controller memory buffer
and virtualization in firmware for SSD device validation
• Code owner and developer of NVMe Processor Complex with 50,000+ lines
of code in embedded C++ as part of core SSD functionality
• Analyzed and validated hardware protocols for SSD devices with packet
capture and trace equipment
